top_comments.comment: Thanks for this film, which I watch shivering in England, a country that is unbearably cold for most of the year. It's a pity we can't share out the heat more.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Dangerous wet-bulb temperatures by the end of the century?!? Please refer to June of 2021, parts of Canada at 122 degrees F.
Thanks for this film, which I watch shivering in England, a country that is unbearably cold for most of the year. It's a pity we can't share out the heat more.
So disturbing
Geoengineering is causing climate change !!

The biggest problem facing the World, is the one that isn't mentioned anywhere in the whole film. It's people, or rather, too many people. The finite wealth of the Earth is being used up in increasing amounts as populations grow unchecked. Land which is essential for producing food, is being swallowed up by more people wanting places to live in. Cities are moving out into more and more areas, leaving fewer food producing areas. As a species, we cannot go on breeding uncontrollably for ever. There has to be a point where population control has to be a factor in continuing to maintain the status quo..There is a tipping point, fast approaching, where the planet will be overwhelmed by horde's using up diminishing assets, essential to existence and we will no longer have a World in which we can survive. I wonder what will move into the new environment and be successful? The World will still be here, only not for us
This is the near future. This is inevitable.

Sorry to break it to ya, but currently we have excess 120ppm of CO2 in atmosphere - and accelerating in wrong direction. And even ZERO emissions (not 'net zero' - JUST ZERO) emissions by miracle from tomorrow onward DON'T change a thing.  With zero emissions and 0,3ppm sequestered naturally - planet will continue to warm up even with ZERO emissions for decades to come.  Don't forget also that there's humongous amount of both CO2 and HEAT ( 1.5 degreee since 1890s ) sequestered in the oceans.
Travel the world and see for yourself. This is pure propagana. Not my problem how they live in Bangladesh.
